CustomField.description: Field used for Sync Fields functionality (API Call) with PROZONE (ROOFPRO).
CustomField.formula:
CASE(Present_Tier_Lookup__r.Name, "Tier 1", "ROOFPRO PREFERRED", "Tier 2", "ROOFPRO SELECT", "Tier 3", "ROOFPRO CRAFTSMAN PREMIER", "Tier 0", "Advantage", "No Tier Chosen")
/*Old Formula CASE(Present_Tier_Lookup__r.Name, "Tier 1", "ROOFPRO PREFERRED", "Tier 2", "ROOFPRO SELECT", "Tier 3", "ROOFPRO CRAFTSMAN PREMIER", "No Tier Chosen")*/
CustomField.label: Tier (Prozone)
